articles.title: Scientists Unearth Stunning Pregnant Sea Reptile Fossil That Reveals the Ocean’s Darkest Secrets - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: A remarkable discovery in Patagonia has unveiled the nearly intact fossil of a pregnant sea reptile.
articles.content: In a groundbreaking study recently published in theJournal of Vertebrate Paleontology, paleontologists have uncovered remarkable details about an ancient marine reptile, Fiona, whose fossil has been … [+5717 chars]
